name: 20 Points to win
description:
3 Game Modes: Classic, Time Trial and High Score

in Game: 

- Escape -> Pause Menu

* I recommend adjust your mouse sensitivity for more precision *

* You can reset the score on Pause Menu in game  *

* On Time Trial and High Score game modes the balls collision with each other are enable *

I created this game for test my Unity skills. 
I'd like to improve it but i don't have skill enough at the moment.
Hope you enjoy it and leave me a comment!
